name: SaitaChain Coin
description: SaitaChain is a dynamic Web 3.0 technology company. With a clear mission to empower, educate and simplify the world of decentralized finance (DeFi) for everyone. SaitaChain's layer-zero mainnet is set to revolutionize blockchain with efficiency, scalability and innovation. Featuring a unique proof-of-stake consensus, cross-chain protocol for seamless asset and data transfers, and flexible dApps supporting complex smart contracts across multiple blockchains.
